Navigation
Name Tutor/Markup/InlineMarkup/ExternalURL
Synopsis Refer to an external URL.
Syntax [ Name ](URL)
Description Creates a link to an external url. Name is displayed in the text, and URL is the destination URL. A URL may contain the characters: :/0-9-a-zA-Z"$\-_.\+!*'(),.
Examples [Rascal](http://www.rascal-mpl.org) gives Rascal.
